greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of sqrt(3) - 1.
comment: Continued fraction expansion leads to the ternary digital root of n.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
program: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=10*(sqrt(3)-1); for (n=0, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b160390.txt", n, " ", d)); }
results.author: _Harry J. Smith_, May 31 2009
